      • checkEmpty

        public void checkEmpty()
        discover if a deck is empty or not. If a deck is empty, declare a winner and exit the program.

      • war

        public int war(Card a,
               Card b)
        fight a war
        Parameters:
        a - the player's card
        b - the computer's card
        Returns:
        the number found when comparing the final card, used in the fight method to re-compare the first two cards
